channel.title: Solved
channel.description:
pi source 317
I have a fisher man (219) and the only option i got is talk. can some 1 give me a turtoriel to make him open up the trade screen when i click talk on him?

item.title: Solved
item.dc:creator: @sonsofgod2 sonsofgod2

item.title: Solved
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

The shop id is the id of the shop you want to open when you click on the fisherman,

Shops are configured in shops.cfg

to add a shop
use this format

//-----ShopID---ShopName----------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount

in shops.cfg

Read full topic

item.title: Solved
item.dc:creator: @sonsofgod2 sonsofgod2

Read full topic

item.title: Solved
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

In ActionHandler class

find the firstclicknpc switch

and add this in there

case 219: c.getShops().openShop(##); break;

the ## would be your shop id

Read full topic
